tags.name: plus-animation
tags.description: Creates an animation and applies it to the content. Powered by the [Web Animations API](https://mdn.io/web-animations-api). A wide range of animations is available [here](https://www.htmlplus.io/component/animation/names).

attributes.name: composite
attributes.description: Determines how values are combined between this animation and other,separate animations that do not specify their own specific composite operation.

attributes.name: delay
attributes.description: The number of milliseconds to delay the start of the animation.

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description: Whether the animation runs forwards (`normal`), backwards (`reverse`),switches direction after each iteration (`alternate`), or runsbackwards and switches direction after each iteration (`alternate-reverse`).

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: The number of milliseconds each iteration of the animation takes to complete.Keep in mind that your animation will not run if this value is 0.

attributes.name: easing
attributes.description: The rate of the animation's change over time.Accepts the pre-defined values "`linear`", "`ease`", "`ease-in`", "`ease-out`", and "`ease-in-out`",or a custom "`cubic-bezier`" value like "`cubic-bezier(0.42, 0, 0.58, 1)`".

attributes.name: end-delay
attributes.description: The number of milliseconds to delay after the end of an animation.This is primarily of use when sequencing animations based on the end time of another animation.

attributes.name: fill
attributes.description: Dictates whether the animation's effects should be reflected by the element(s)prior to playing ("`backwards`"), retained after the animation has completedplaying ("`forwards`"), or `both`.

attributes.name: instance
attributes.description: The [Animation](https://mdn.io/api-animation) object instance.

attributes.name: iteration-composite
attributes.description: Determines how values build from iteration to iteration in this animation.Can be set to `accumulate` or `replace`.

attributes.name: iterations
attributes.description: The number of times the animation should repeat. And can also take a value of[Infinity](https://mdn.io/infinity)to make it repeat for as long as the element exists.

attributes.name: iteration-start
attributes.description: Describes at what point in the iteration the animation should start.0.5 would indicate starting halfway through the first iteration for example,and with this value set, an animation with 2 iterations would end halfway througha third iteration.

attributes.name: keyframes
attributes.description: A [keyframes](https://mdn.io/keyframe-formats)object or `null`.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Specifies what kind of animation will play.The list of available animations is [here](/component/animation/names).

attributes.name: playback-rate
attributes.description: Sets the animation's playback rate.

attributes.name: run
attributes.description: Starts the animation.

tags.name: plus-aspect-ratio
tags.description: Sets a preferred aspect ratio only for the first child inside the component.

attributes.name: min-height
attributes.description: Specifies the minimum height.

attributes.name: max-height
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum height.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Specifies the ratio.

tags.description: TODO

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description: TODO

attributes.description: TODO

attributes.description: TODO

attributes.name: stacked
attributes.description: TODO

tags.name: plus-breadcrumb
tags.description: Breadcrumb component is a navigation pattern that shows the actual path of the current page.

attributes.name: expander-text
attributes.description: Specifies the label for the expander button.

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: Specifies the position of the expander button.The expander button is displayed when the number of items reached the maximum limit.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Specifies the Maximum number of items that are allowed to be displayed.

attributes.name: separator
attributes.description: Specifies the separator between items.

tags.name: plus-browse
tags.description: Allows you to select file or files by using click or drag & drop functionality.

attributes.name: accept
attributes.description: One or more[unique file type specifiers](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/file#unique_file_type_specifiers)describing file types to allow.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the component functionality.

attributes.name: droppable
attributes.description: Adds droppable ability.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Specifies the minimum number of files.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum number of files.

attributes.name: min-size
attributes.description: Specifies the minimum size of the file(s) in bytes.

attributes.name: max-size
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum size of the file(s) in bytes.

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Allows to select more than one file.

tags.name: plus-card
tags.description: Cards contain content and actions about a single subject.

attributes.name: elevation
attributes.description: If you want the card to have shadow, use the elevation property,And select the property value between `1` and `24`.

attributes.name: flat
attributes.description: Use the flat property to neutralize elevation.

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: If you want the card to have border, use the outlined property.

attributes.name: tile
attributes.description: Use tile property to neutralize border-radius.

tags.name: plus-center
tags.description: Centers content vertically and horizontally.

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description: Converts the `display` CSS property from `flex` to `inline-flex`.

tags.name: plus-click-outside
tags.description: Detects when a click event happens outside of itself.

attributes.name: capture
attributes.description: A boolean value indicating that events of this type will be dispatched to the registered`listener` before being dispatched to any `EventTarget` beneath it in the DOM tree.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the component functionality.

attributes.name: once
attributes.description: The event fires only once.

tags.name: plus-counter
tags.description: Can be used to quickly create animations that display numerical data in a more interesting way.

attributes.name: easing
attributes.description: Easing function. Click [here](http://robertpenner.com/easing) for more details.

attributes.name: decimal
attributes.description: Specifies decimal character.

attributes.name: decimals
attributes.description: Amount of decimals to display.

attributes.name: delay
attributes.description: Delay in milliseconds before starting the transition.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: Duration in milliseconds.

attributes.name: from
attributes.description: Initial value.

attributes.name: numerals
attributes.description: Specifies numeral glyph substitution.

attributes.name: play
attributes.description: Starts/Stops the transition.

attributes.name: separator
attributes.description: Specifies character of thousands separator.

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: Target value.

tags.name: plus-cropper
tags.description: Used for cropping large images to fit a container before uploading them to the server.

attributes.name: area
attributes.description: A number between 0 and 1. Specifies the automatic cropping area size.

attributes.name: aspect-ratio
attributes.description: Specifies the initial aspect ratio of the viewport.

attributes.name: backdrop
attributes.description: Shows the black modal above the image and under the viewport.

attributes.name: background
attributes.description: Shows the grid background of the container.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the component functionality.

attributes.name: guides
attributes.description: Shows the dashed lines above the viewport.

attributes.name: indicator
attributes.description: Shows the center indicator above the viewport.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: Specifies the mode.

attributes.name: resizer
attributes.description: Enables to resize the viewport by dragging (Works when the value of the `mode` property is `crop`).

attributes.name: resizer-shape
attributes.description: Specifies the shape of the resizer.

attributes.name: responsive
attributes.description: Re-renders when resizing the window.

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description: Specifies the shape of the viewport.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: Specifies the image's src.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Gets/Sets data.

attributes.name: view
attributes.description: Specifies the view.

attributes.name: zoomable
attributes.description: Enables to zoom the image.

attributes.name: zoom-ratio
attributes.description: Specifies zoom ratio when zooming the image by wheeling the mouse.

tags.name: plus-dialog
tags.description: A dialog is a `conversation` between the system and the user. It is prompted when the system needs input from the user or to give the user urgent information concerning their current workflow.

attributes.name: animation
attributes.description: TODO

attributes.name: backdrop
attributes.description: Activate the dialog's backdrop to show or not.

attributes.name: connector
attributes.description: This property helps you to attach which dialog toggler controls the dialog.It doesn't matter where the dialog toggler is.You can put the dialog's toggler inside or outside of the dialog.Read more about connectors [here](/connector).

attributes.name: full-height
attributes.description: Set the height of the dialog as much as the screen's height.

attributes.name: full-width
attributes.description: Set the width of the dialog as much as the screen's width.

attributes.name: fullscreen
attributes.description: Set both width and height of the dialog to occupy the screen size.

attributes.name: keyboard
attributes.description: Closes the dialog when `escape` key is pressed.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Control dialog to show or not.

attributes.name: persistent
attributes.description: It prevents the dialog from closing on clicking outside of the element.

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description: Specifies where to show the dialog box by choosing two values, one for horizontal and another for vertical.Horizontal has a range of `left`, `center`, `right`, `start`, `end`, and vertical values are `top`, `center` and `bottom`.

attributes.name: portal
attributes.description: Enables or disables the portal.

attributes.name: portal-strategy
attributes.description: Specifies the position of the dialog.

attributes.name: portal-target
attributes.description: Specifies the position of the dialog relative to the target.

attributes.name: scrollable
attributes.description: It makes the user able to scroll the content by adding a scroll beside it.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determine the width of the dialog.

attributes.name: sticky
attributes.description: Removes the margin around the dialog's content.

attributes.name: scrollable
attributes.description: It makes the user able to scroll the content by adding a scroll beside it.

attributes.name: scrollable
attributes.description: It makes the user able to scroll the content by adding a scroll beside it.

attributes.name: connector
attributes.description: This property helps you to attach which dialog this toggler controls.It doesn't matter where the dialog toggler is.You can put the dialog's toggler inside or outside of the dialog.Read more about connectors [here](/connector).

tags.name: plus-divider
tags.description: A thin line that divides the content vertically or horizontally.

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description: Specifies the location of the default slot.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Specifies the width of the border.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Specifies the style of the border.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Specifies the amount of indentation.

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: Draws the divider in a vertical orientation.

tags.name: plus-drawer
tags.description: This component lets you add collapsible side contents like navigation alongside some primary content.

attributes.name: animation
attributes.description: TODO

attributes.name: backdrop
attributes.description: Activate the drawer's backdrop to show or not.

attributes.name: breakpoint
attributes.description: Sets the mobile breakpoint to apply alternate styles for mobile deviceswhen the breakpoint value is met.

attributes.name: connector
attributes.description: This property helps you to attach which drawer toggler controls the drawer.It doesn't matter where the drawer toggler is.You can put the drawer's toggler inside or outside of the drawer.Read more about connectors [here](/connector).

attributes.name: mini
attributes.description: Set the width of drawer to the minimum size you specified for the `mini-size` property.

attributes.name: mini-size
attributes.description: Sets the minimum width size of the drawer.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Control drawer to show or not.

attributes.name: persistent
attributes.description: If true, don't allow the drawer to be closed by clicking outside of the drawer.If false, the drawer will be closed by clicking outside of it.

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description: Specifies where the drawer will open.

attributes.name: flexible
attributes.description: It controls the flexibility of the drawer's width. If yes, the width of the drawer can be reduced.If false doesn't allow the width of the drawer to reduce.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Determine the width of the drawer.

attributes.name: temporary
attributes.description: On default the drawer is considered as a part of the main container.it pushes the other contents on opening.If true it will be opened over other contents and doesn't affect other contents.A temporary drawer sits above its application and uses a backdrop to darken the background.

attributes.name: connector
attributes.description: This property helps you to attach which drawer this toggler controls.It doesn't matter where the drawer toggler is.You can put the drawer's toggler inside or outside of the drawer.Read more about connectors [here](/connector).

tags.name: plus-faker
tags.description: Generates massive amounts of fake (but realistic) data for testing and development. Powered by [Faker](https://fakerjs.dev/).

attributes.name: api
attributes.description: Specifies the [API](https://fakerjs.dev/api).

attributes.name: arguments
attributes.description: Specifies the API's arguments as an array.

attributes.name: instance
attributes.description: The [Faker](https://fakerjs.dev/guide/usage.html) object instance.

attributes.name: seed
attributes.description: Keeps the result constant.

tags.name: plus-format-bytes
tags.description: Converts bytes to a human-readable string. [Metric and IEC](https://wikipedia.org/wiki/Gigabyte) standard are supported.

attributes.name: display
attributes.description: Specifies the unit will be shown as an abbreviation or not.

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: Localizes the result. [More](https://mdn.io/number-format/constructor).

attributes.name: decimals
attributes.description: Specifies the number of decimal places.Use an array to specify the minimum and maximum.

attributes.name: separator
attributes.description: Specifies the separator between number and unit.

attributes.name: signed
attributes.description: Shows plus sign for positive numbers.If the difference is exactly zero a space character will be prepended instead for better alignment.

attributes.name: standard
attributes.description: Specifies the standard of units.[Metric and IEC](https://wikipedia.org/wiki/Gigabyte) are supported.

attributes.name: unit
attributes.description: Specifies the unit in which the result will be returned.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The bytes value to convert.

tags.name: plus-grid
tags.description: It's the most flexible and powerful grid system which you need to build simple to complex responsive layouts, using two main components, `plus-grid` as a container & `plus-grid-item`. By using these components, align your content in any form & shape and for all screen sizes with 12 available column sizes and 6 breakpoints.

attributes.name: align-content
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically across all rows (It overrides alignItems).

attributes.name: align-content-xs
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically across all rows for extra-small display sizes(It overrides alignItemsXs).

attributes.name: align-content-sm
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically across all rows for small display sizes(It overrides alignItemsSm).

attributes.name: align-content-md
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically across all rows for medium display sizes(It overrides alignItemsMd).

attributes.name: align-content-lg
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically across all rows for large display sizes(It overrides alignItemsLg).

attributes.name: align-content-xl
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically across all rows for extra-large display sizes(It overrides alignItemsXl).

attributes.name: align-content-xxl
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically across all rows for extra-extra-large display sizes(It overrides alignItemsXXl).

attributes.name: align-items
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically inside their own row.

attributes.name: align-items-xs
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically inside their own row for extra-small display sizes.

attributes.name: align-items-sm
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically inside their own row for small display sizes.

attributes.name: align-items-md
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically inside their own row for medium display sizes.

attributes.name: align-items-lg
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically inside their own row for large display sizes.

attributes.name: align-items-xl
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically inside their own row for extra-large display sizes.

attributes.name: align-items-xxl
attributes.description: Aligns contents vertically inside their own row for extra-extra-large display sizes.

attributes.name: gutter
attributes.description: Adds a gap between contents to make space between them vertically and horizontally.

attributes.name: gutter-x
attributes.description: Adds a gap between contents to make space between them horizontally.

attributes.name: gutter-y
attributes.description: Adds a gap between contents to make space between them vertically.

attributes.name: justify-content
attributes.description: Justifies contents horizontally.

attributes.name: justify-content-xs
attributes.description: Justifies contents horizontally for extra-small display sizes.

attributes.name: justify-content-sm
attributes.description: Justifies contents horizontally for small display sizes.

attributes.name: justify-content-md
attributes.description: Justifies contents horizontally for medium display sizes.

attributes.name: justify-content-lg
attributes.description: Justifies contents horizontally for large display sizes.

attributes.name: justify-content-xl
attributes.description: Justifies contents horizontally for extra-large display sizes.

attributes.name: justify-content-xxl
attributes.description: Justifies contents horizontally for extra-extra-large display sizes.

attributes.name: reverse
attributes.description: Reverses the flow of contents from left-to-right to right-to-left, or vice-versa.

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: Changes the flow of contents from left-to-right to top-to-down.

attributes.name: wrap
attributes.description: Controls allowing the container to wrap the content or not if the cumulative widthsize of contents is more than the twelve-column width.

attributes.name: wrap-xs
attributes.description: Controls allowing the container to wrap the content or not if the cumulative widthsize of contents is more than the twelve-column width for extra-small screen devices.

attributes.name: wrap-sm
attributes.description: Controls allowing the container to wrap the content or not if the cumulative widthsize of contents is more than the twelve-column width for small screen devices.

attributes.name: wrap-md
attributes.description: Controls allowing the container to wrap the content or not if the cumulative widthsize of contents is more than the twelve-column width for medium screen devices.

attributes.name: wrap-lg
attributes.description: Controls allowing the container to wrap the content or not if the cumulative widthsize of contents is more than the twelve-column width for large screen devices.

attributes.name: wrap-xl
attributes.description: Controls allowing the container to wrap the content or not if the cumulative widthsize of contents is more than the twelve-column width for extra-large screen devices.

attributes.name: wrap-xxl
attributes.description: Controls allowing the container to wrap the content or not if the cumulative widthsize of contents is more than the twelve-column width for extra-extra-large screen devices.

attributes.name: align-self
attributes.description: Aligns the grid-item vertically in its container (grid).It overrides the align-items property of its parent.

attributes.name: align-self-xs
attributes.description: Aligns the grid-item vertically in its container (grid) for extra-small display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.(It overrides the align-items property of its parent just for extra-small breakpoints).

attributes.name: align-self-sm
attributes.description: Aligns the grid-item vertically in its container (grid) for small display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.(It overrides the align-items property of its parent just for small breakpoints).

attributes.name: align-self-md
attributes.description: Aligns the grid-item vertically in its container (grid) for medium display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.(It overrides the align-items property of its parent just for medium breakpoints).

attributes.name: align-self-lg
attributes.description: Aligns the grid-item vertically in its container (grid) for large display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.(It overrides the align-items property of its parent just for large breakpoints).

attributes.name: align-self-xl
attributes.description: Aligns the grid-item vertically in its container (grid) for extra-large display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.(It overrides the align-items property of its parent just for extra-large breakpoints).

attributes.name: align-self-xxl
attributes.description: Aligns the grid-item vertically in its container (grid) for extra-extra-large display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.(It overrides the align-items property of its parent just for extra-extra-large breakpoints).

attributes.name: xs
attributes.description: Specifies the number of columns for extra-small viewports (portrait phones).It also determines the number of columns for bigger display sizes whenother upper breakpoints (sm, md, lg, xl and xxl) are not specified.

attributes.name: sm
attributes.description: Specifies the number of columns for small viewports (landscape phones).It also determines the number of columns for bigger display sizes whenother upper breakpoints (md, lg, xl and xxl) are not specified.

attributes.name: md
attributes.description: Specifies the number of columns for medium viewports (tablets).It also determines the number of columns for bigger display sizes whenother upper breakpoints (lg, xl and xxl) are not specified.

attributes.name: lg
attributes.description: Specifies the number of columns for large viewports (desktop).It also determines the number of columns for bigger display sizes whenthe upper breakpoint (xl and xxl) is not specified.

attributes.name: xl
attributes.description: Specifies the number of columns for large viewports (large desktops).It also determines the number of columns for bigger display sizes whenthe upper breakpoint (xxl) is not specified.

attributes.name: xxl
attributes.description: Specifies the number of columns for extra-extra-large viewports (larger desktops).

attributes.name: hide-xs
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in extra-small display sizes (portrait phones).

attributes.name: hide-sm
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in small display sizes (landscape phones).

attributes.name: hide-md
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in medium display sizes (tablets).

attributes.name: hide-lg
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in large display sizes (desktop).

attributes.name: hide-xl
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in extra-large display sizes (large desktops).

attributes.name: hide-xxl
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in extra-extra-large display sizes (larger desktops).

attributes.name: hide
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in all display sizes.

attributes.name: hide-sm-up
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in small and larger display sizes.

attributes.name: hide-md-up
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in medium and larger display sizes.

attributes.name: hide-lg-up
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in large and larger display sizes.

attributes.name: hide-xl-up
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in large and larger display sizes.

attributes.name: hide-sm-down
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in small and smaller display sizes.

attributes.name: hide-md-down
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in medium and smaller display sizes.

attributes.name: hide-lg-down
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in large and smaller display sizes.

attributes.name: hide-xl-down
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in large and smaller display sizes.

attributes.name: hide-xxl-down
attributes.description: Hides the grid-item in large and smaller display sizes.

attributes.name: offset-xs
attributes.description: Adds an offset space before the grid-item for extra-small display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.

attributes.name: offset-sm
attributes.description: Adds an offset space before the grid-item for small display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.

attributes.name: offset-md
attributes.description: Adds an offset space before the grid-item for medium display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.

attributes.name: offset-lg
attributes.description: Adds an offset space before the grid-item for large display sizes.It also applies to the larger breakpoint (xl) while that is not specified.

attributes.name: offset-xl
attributes.description: Adds an offset space before the grid-item for extra-large display sizes.

attributes.name: offset-xxl
attributes.description: Adds an offset space before the grid-item for extra-extra-large display sizes.

attributes.name: order-xs
attributes.description: Overrides the default order of the grid-item for extra-small display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.

attributes.name: order-sm
attributes.description: Overrides the default order of the grid-item for small display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.

attributes.name: order-md
attributes.description: Overrides the default order of the grid-item for medium display sizes.It also applies to larger breakpoints and display sizes while they are not specified.

attributes.name: order-lg
attributes.description: Overrides the default order of the grid-item for large display sizes.It also applies to the larger breakpoint (xl) while that is not specified.

attributes.name: order-xl
attributes.description: Overrides the default order of the grid-item for extra-large display sizes.

attributes.name: order-xxl
attributes.description: Overrides the default order of the grid-item for extra-extra-large display sizes.

tags.name: plus-icon
tags.description: Symbols for common actions and items.This component gives you access to the icon libraries (font awesome, icon material, ...).

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: TODOsize (cm,mm,in,px,pt,pc,em,ex,ch,rem,vw,vh,vmin,vmax,%)inversespininactive/disabledAdjusts the color of the icons.(All main web color formats are accepted)

attributes.name: flip
attributes.description: Flips the icon.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Specifies the name of the icon.

attributes.name: rotate
attributes.description: Rotates the icon.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Specifies the size of the icon.`xs`, `sm`, `lg` and `1x` to `10x`.

tags.name: plus-intersection
tags.description: The [Intersection Observer API](https://mdn.io/intersection-observer-api) provides a way to asynchronously observe changes in the intersection of a target element with an ancestor element or with a top-level document's [viewport](https://mdn.io/glossary-viewport).

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the component functionality.

attributes.name: once
attributes.description: The event fires only once.

attributes.name: root
attributes.description: The element that is used as the viewport for checking visibility of the target. Must be theancestor of the target. Defaults to the browser viewport if not specified or if `null`.

attributes.name: root-margin
attributes.description: Margin around the root. Can have values similar to the CSS[margin](https://mdn.io/margin)property, e.g. `"10px 20px 30px 40px"` (top, right, bottom, left). The values can bepercentages. This set of values serves to grow or shrink each side of the root element'sbounding box before computing intersections. Defaults to all zeros.

attributes.name: threshold
attributes.description: Either a single number or an array of numbers which indicate at what percentage of thetarget's visibility the observer's callback should be executed. If you only want to detectwhen visibility passes the 50% mark, you can use a value of 0.5. If you want the callback torun every time visibility passes another 25%, you would specify the array[0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1]. The default is 0 (meaning as soon as even one pixel is visible, thecallback will be run). A value of 1.0 means that the threshold isn't considered passed untilevery pixel is visible.

tags.name: plus-portal
tags.description: With a portal, you can render a component in a different place in the DOM tree,

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the portal.

attributes.name: strategy
attributes.description: Specifies the position of the portal content relative to the target.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Specifies the position of the portal content, It Can include css selectors,node or any html elements.

tags.name: plus-scroll-detector
tags.description: TODO.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the component functionality.

attributes.name: source
attributes.description: Specifies the source of the scroll.

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: Indicates which scroll (horizontal or vertical) is to be used as the source.

tags.name: plus-scroll-indicator
tags.description: Scroll Indicator is a responsive reading progress bar that increases with the scroll of the container.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the component function.

attributes.name: source
attributes.description: Specifies the source of the scroll.

tags.name: plus-signature
tags.description: Allows user to draw smooth signatures.

attributes.name: background-color
attributes.description: Specifies the background color.

attributes.name: clear-on-resize
attributes.description: Clears the canvas after resizing.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Specifies the color of the strokes.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the component functionality.

attributes.name: distance
attributes.description: Specifies the distance between the previous point and the next one.

attributes.name: dot-size
attributes.description: Specifies the radius of a single dot.

attributes.name: max-width
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum width of the strokes.

attributes.name: min-width
attributes.description: Specifies the minimum width of the strokes.

attributes.name: resizable
attributes.description: Observes the component dimensions to apply new changes on the canvas.

attributes.name: throttle
attributes.description: Specifies the time distance between the previous point and the next one.

attributes.name: velocity
attributes.description: Specifies the velocity based on the previous velocity.

tags.name: plus-spinner
tags.description: An indicator of progress and activity.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Specifies the size of the spinner.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Specifies which variant of the spinner to use.

tags.name: plus-sticky
tags.description: Component content is positioned based on the user's scroll position.

attributes.name: top
attributes.description: Specifies the space from top.

attributes.name: watcher
attributes.description: To active `state` attribute, `change` event, `normal` slot, or `stick` slot, Set it to `true`.

attributes.name: z-index
attributes.description: Specifies the z-index.

tags.name: plus-switch
tags.description: Toggles the state of a single item on or off.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Puts the switch in checked state.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the switch.

tags.name: plus-tabs
tags.description: Organizes content across different screens.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Provides your own value.

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: You can use vertical property for vertical mode.

attributes.name: connector
attributes.description: Panels are not always used inside tabs.They may be used outside, in which you can usethis property to connect them to their corresponding tabs.

tags.name: plus-tabs-bar
tags.description: TODO: Arranges tabs within a bar.

attributes.name: grow
attributes.description: Grows tabs as much as all available space (occupies all horizontal space).

attributes.name: justify
attributes.description: Specifies how the tabs are aligned.

attributes.name: reverse
attributes.description: Reverses the arrangement of the tabs.

tags.description: TODO: This component contains the contents of each tab and when the tab is activated the panel is displayed.

attributes.name: connector
attributes.description: Panels are not always used inside tabs.They may be used outside, in which you can use this property to connect them to their corresponding tabs.
